data.comment: Today's referee, Craig Pawson, has blown to start the match.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
In the minute 2, Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Wolverhampton!
Neco Williams (Liverpool) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 4, Wolverhampton's Ruben Neves breaks free at Anfield. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Craig Pawson awards Liverpool a goal kick.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Anfield.
In the minute 5, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Craig Pawson awards the away team a throw-in.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 7, Fernando Marcal (Wolverhampton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
In the minute 9, Free kick Liverpool.
Pedro Neto for Wolverhampton is whistled offside.
Liverpool attack but Sadio Mane's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 12, Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Liverpool at Anfield.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
Wolverhampton drives forward and Daniel Podence gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Liverpool.
In the minute 21, Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Goal! Liverpool have got their heads in front thanks to a Mohamed Salah strike.
Pedro Neto for the away team is judged to be offside.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
Throw-in Liverpool.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Wolverhampton.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
Important block from the Wolverhampton defence as Roberto Firmino fires in a strike for Liverpool.
In the minute 34, Sadio Mane (Liverpool) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 35, Mohamed Salah of Liverpool smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Wolverhampton are coming forward and Leander Dendoncker gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, The match at Anfield has been interrupted briefly for a check on Curtis Jones, who is down injured.
Throw-in for Liverpool at Anfield.
Curtis Jones is back on his feet again.
In the minute 39, Liverpool's Sadio Mane gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Wolverhampton defender.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Liverpool needs to be cautious. Wolverhampton have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 42, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
At Anfield the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Liverpool pushes forward through Sadio Mane, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 49, Throw-in high up the field for Wolverhampton in Liverpool.
Sadio Mane of Liverpool gets in a strike, but is off target.
Craig Pawson awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
In the minute 52, In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Liverpool at Anfield.
Liverpool have a dangerous throw-in.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Craig Pawson signals a throw-in for Wolverhampton, close to Liverpool's area.
Goal! Liverpool extend their lead to 2-0 through Georginio Wijnaldum.
In the minute 58, Jordan Henderson instrumental with a fine assist.
Craig Pawson signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Liverpool's half.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wolverhampton's Daniel Podence is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 62, Daniel Podence is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The away team have replaced Ruben Neves with Fabio Silva. This is the first substitution made today by Nuno Espirito Santo.
In the minute 64, Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolverhampton's half?
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
In the minute 66, Andrew Robertson of Liverpool is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 67, Goal! Liverpool increase their lead to 3-0 through a well-placed header from Joel Matip.
Mohamed Salah with an assist there.
Jurgen Klopp is making the team's first substitution at Anfield with Trent Alexander-Arnold replacing Neco Williams.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Liverpool.
Wolverhampton's Leander Dendoncker is on target but unsuccessful.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, The away team replace Daniel Podence with Rayan Ait-Nouri.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
Jurgen Klopp (Liverpool) is making a second substitution, with Diogo Jota replacing Roberto Firmino.
In the minute 74, Liverpool drives forward and Curtis Jones gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Own goal in Liverpool! Nelson Semedo scores in his own net to make it 4-0.
In the minute 79, Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Liverpool territory.
Vitinha is replacing Pedro Neto for Wolverhampton at Anfield.
In Liverpool Wolverhampton drive forward through Rayan Ait-Nouri. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Wolverhampton's Adama Traore gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
Naby Keita is replacing Jordan Henderson for the home team.
Craig Pawson awards Liverpool a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Liverpool needs to be cautious. Wolverhampton have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 88, Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Wolverhampton.
In the minute 89, Can Liverpool capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Joao Moutinho for Wolverhampton has been booked by Craig Pawson and receives a first yellow card.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
In Liverpool Liverpool attack through Mohamed Salah. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
Craig Pawson will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Wolverhampton's Leander Dendoncker has run offside.
Full-time! The final score is 4-0.
